locatePointer.name: locatePointer
locatePointer.description[zh_CN]: 按下并释放Ctrl键时高亮显示指针当前位置
locatePointer.description: Highlights the current location of the pointer when the Control key is pressed and released

leftHanded.name: leftHanded
leftHanded.description[zh_CN]: 为左手用户交换鼠标左右键
leftHanded.description: Swap left and right mouse buttons for left-handed mice

naturalScroll.name: naturalScroll
naturalScroll.description[zh_CN]: 启用鼠标自然（反向）滚动
naturalScroll.description: Set this to TRUE to enable natural (reverse) scrolling for mouses

disableTouchpad.name: disableTouchpad
disableTouchpad.name[zh_CN]: 检测到鼠标时禁用触控板
disableTouchpad.description[zh_CN]: 当检测到鼠标时禁用触控板

adaptiveAccelProfile.name: adaptiveAccelProfile
adaptiveAccelProfile.description[zh_CN]: 使用自适应鼠标加速配置

motionAcceleration.name: motionAcceleration
motionAcceleration.description[zh_CN]: 鼠标移动加速倍数，-1为系统默认值
motionAcceleration.description: Acceleration multiplier for mouse motion. A value of -1 is the system default

motionThreshold.name: motionThreshold
motionThreshold.description[zh_CN]: 激活鼠标加速前指针必须移动的距离（像素），-1为系统默认值
motionThreshold.description: Distance in pixels the pointer must move before accelerated mouse motion is activated. A value of -1 is the system default

motionScaling.name: motionScaling
motionScaling.description[zh_CN]: 鼠标移动速度倍数，-1为系统默认值
motionScaling.description: Acceleration multiplier for mouse motion. A value of -1 is the system default

doubleClick.name: doubleClick
doubleClick.description: Length of a double click in milliseconds

dragThreshold.name: dragThreshold
dragThreshold.description: Distance before a drag is started

middleButtonEnabled.name: middleButtonEnabled
middleButtonEnabled.description[zh_CN]: 通过同时点击左右键来模拟中键
middleButtonEnabled.description: Enables middle mouse button emulation through simultaneous left and right button click
